event_2110_3W_StepUp_01_01:
Completing Tier 5 will get you a 5★ Great Scout Ticket!
You can use it in the Ticket Scout to get a 5★ sync pair
that has an increased chance to be Skyla & Togekiss!
event_2110_3W_StepUp_01_06:
Completing Tier 10 will get you a 5★ Master Scout
Ticket! You can use it in the Ticket Scout for a
guaranteed chance to scout Skyla & Togekiss!
